text: Tatiana Kumar (born 9 April 1998) is a Malaysian model and beauty pageant titleholder. She was crowned Miss World Malaysia 2016, and represented Malaysia in the global Miss World 2016. == Background == Tatiana Kumar is the daughter of a French mother and local Malaysian Indian father. She attended the French School of Kuala Lumpur. == Pageantry == Tatiana was crowned Miss World Malaysia 2016 in Kuala Lumpur on 27 August 2016. She represented Malaysia at the global Miss World 2016 held at the Washington D.C., United States on 18 December 2016. However, after a few months in March 2017, she was stripped of her title, as Miss Malaysia World committee stated that it was due to her posting "offensive" contents online, as well as for breaching conduct and contract terms, without explaining further. In December 2018, Tatiana states the reason that her title was removed was that she declined to do a lingerie photoshoot. ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:People from Kuala Lumpur Category:Malaysian beauty pageant winners Category:Malaysian people of Indian descent Category:Malaysian people of French descent Category:Miss World 2016 delegates
title: Tatiana Kumar
